thread.title: Trump administration closes fewer deportation cases

title: Trump administration closes fewer deportation cases
text:
Trump administration closes fewer deportation cases 12:05pm BST - 01:42 
The administration of President Donald Trump has sharply curtailed a once-common practice of granting long-term reprieves to immigrants targeted for deportation, something that was common during President Barack Obama’s time in office. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The administration of President Donald Trump has sharply curtailed a once-common practice of granting long-term reprieves to immigrants targeted for deportation, something that was common during President Barack Obama’s time in office.
